languages.text: Вы драите палубы несколько часов, пока какой-то беззубый старик не окликает вас. Вам протягивают пустую похлебку и зачерствевший кусок биоматериала, покрытый плесенью — ваш обед. Затем охрана сгоняет всех в соседний отсек. И еще один. И еще. Пока последний удар корабельного гонга не оповещает об отбое. Пора спать.

traits.locale_text: Вы драите палубы несколько часов, пока какой-то беззубый старик не окликает вас. Вам протягивают пустую похлебку и зачерствевший кусок биоматериала, покрытый плесенью — ваш обед. Затем охрана сгоняет всех в соседний отсек. И еще один. И еще. Пока последний удар корабельного гонга не оповещает об отбое. Пора спать.

languages.text: You scrub the decks for several hours until a toothless old man calls out to you. You are handed a bowl of clear broth and a stale, mouldy piece of biomaterial — lunch. Then security herds everyone into an adjacent chamber to resume cleaning. And then another one. And another one. Until the final strike of the ship's gong marks the end of the watch. Might as well get some sleep.
languages.original_text: Вы драите палубы несколько часов, пока какой-то беззубый старик не окликает вас. Вам протягивают пустую похлебку и зачерствевший кусок биоматериала, покрытый плесенью — ваш обед. Затем охрана сгоняет всех в соседний отсек. И еще один. И еще. Пока последний удар корабельного гонга не оповещает об отбое. Пора спать.

traits.locale_text: You scrub the decks for several hours until a toothless old man calls out to you. You're handed a bowl of clear broth and a stale, mouldy piece of biomaterial. That's your lunch. Then security herds everyone into an adjacent chamber. And another one. And one more. Until the final strike of the ship's gong marks bedtime. You might as well get some sleep.

Then security herds everyone into an adjacent chamber. And another one. And one more. Until the final strike of the ship's gong marks bedtime. You might as well get some sleep.

The Rogue Trader scrubs the decks for several hours until a toothless old man calls out to {mf|him|her}. {mf|He|She} is handed a bowl of clear broth and a stale, mouldy piece of biomaterial — lunch. Then security herds everyone into an adjacent chamber to resume cleaning. And then another one. And another one. Until the final strike of the ship's gong marks the end of the watch. Might as well get some sleep.

Then security herds everyone into an adjacent chamber to resume cleaning. And then another one. And another one. Until the final strike of the ship's gong marks the end of the watch. You scrub the decks for several hours until a toothless old man calls out to you. You are handed a bowl of clear broth and a stale, mouldy piece of biomaterial — lunch. Then security herds everyone into an adjacent chamber to resume cleaning. And then another one. And another one. Until the final strike of the ship's gong marks the end of the watch. Might as well get some sleep.

languages.text: 你擦了好几个小时的甲板，直到某个掉光了牙齿的老人叫住了你。老人递给你一碗清汤，以及一块陈旧发霉的生物质，这就是午餐了。随后，安保人员把所有人赶到了邻近的房间，要求继续清洗甲板。然后是另一个房间，之后又是另一个。直到船上的锣终于响了起来，艰苦的工作才终于结束。你感觉你需要睡上一阵子。
languages.original_text: You scrub the decks for several hours until a toothless old man calls out to you. You are handed a bowl of clear broth and a stale, mouldy piece of biomaterial — lunch. Then security herds everyone into an adjacent chamber to resume cleaning. And then another one. And another one. Until the final strike of the ship's gong marks the end of the watch. Might as well get some sleep.

traits.locale_text: 你擦了好几个小时的甲板，直到某个掉光了牙齿的老人叫住了你。老人递给你一碗清汤，以及一块陈旧发霉的生物质，这就是午餐了。随后，安保人员把所有人赶到了邻近的房间，要求继续清洗甲板。然后是另一个房间，之后又是另一个。直到船上的锣终于响了起来，艰苦的工作才终于结束。你感觉你需要睡上一阵子。

languages.text: Friegas las cubiertas durante horas hasta que un anciano desdentado te llama. Te entrega un bol de caldo transparente y un trozo de biomateria mohosa y rancia: la comida. Después, seguridad lleva a todo el mundo a una cámara adyacente para que sigáis con la limpieza. Y luego, a otra más. Y otra. Y otra, hasta que el último golpe del gong señala el final del turno. Llegados a este punto, más vale echarse a dormir.
languages.original_text: You scrub the decks for several hours until a toothless old man calls out to you. You are handed a bowl of clear broth and a stale, mouldy piece of biomaterial — lunch. Then security herds everyone into an adjacent chamber to resume cleaning. And then another one. And another one. Until the final strike of the ship's gong marks the end of the watch. Might as well get some sleep.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente friega las cubiertas durante horas hasta que un anciano desdentado {mf|le|la} llama. Le entrega un bol de caldo transparente y un trozo de biomateria mohosa y rancia: la comida. Después, seguridad lleva a todo el mundo a una cámara adyacente para que continúen con la limpieza. Y luego, a otra más. Y otra. Y otra, hasta que el último golpe del gong señala el final del turno. Llegados a este punto, más vale echarse a dormir.

languages.text: あなたが甲板を何時間も磨き続けていると、歯の抜けた老人が話しかけてきた。彼は透明なスープと、古くてカビの生えたバイオマテリアル…昼食を渡す。そして警備員は全員を隣の部屋へと押し集め、清掃を再開させる。その後、警備員が全員を隣の部屋に集め、掃除を再開する。また次の部屋へ。そのまた次の部屋へ。船の銅鑼が鳴り響き、監視されるのが終わるまで。そろそろ寝たほうがいい。
languages.original_text: You scrub the decks for several hours until a toothless old man calls out to you. You are handed a bowl of clear broth and a stale, mouldy piece of biomaterial — lunch. Then security herds everyone into an adjacent chamber to resume cleaning. And then another one. And another one. Until the final strike of the ship's gong marks the end of the watch. Might as well get some sleep.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーが甲板を何時間も磨き続けていると、歯の抜けた老人が話しかけてきた。彼は透明なスープと、古くてカビの生えたバイオマテリアル…昼食を渡す。そして警備員は全員を隣の部屋へと押し集め、清掃を再開させる。その後、警備員が全員を隣の部屋に集め、掃除を再開する。また次の部屋へ。そのまた次の部屋へ。船の銅鑼が鳴り響き、監視されるのが終わるまで。そろそろ寝たほうがいい。

languages.text: Du schrubbst stundenlang das Deck, bis ein zahnloser alter Mann nach dir ruft. Du bekommst eine Schale mit klarer Brühe und ein schimmliges Stück Biomaterial ... das Mittagessen. Dann scheucht die Sicherheit alle in die nächste Kammer, um dort weiterzuputzen. Und dann in die nächste. Und noch eine. Bis der letzte Schlag des Schiffsgongs das Ende der Schicht signalisiert. Jetzt eine Mütze Schlaf.
languages.original_text: You scrub the decks for several hours until a toothless old man calls out to you. You are handed a bowl of clear broth and a stale, mouldy piece of biomaterial — lunch. Then security herds everyone into an adjacent chamber to resume cleaning. And then another one. And another one. Until the final strike of the ship's gong marks the end of the watch. Might as well get some sleep.

traits.locale_text: Du schrubbst stundenlang das Deck, bis ein zahnloser alter Mann nach dir ruft. Du bekommst eine Schale mit klarer Brühe und ein schimmliges Stück Biomaterial ... das Mittagessen. Dann scheucht die Sicherheit alle in die nächste Kammer, um dort weiterzuputzen. Und dann in die nächste. Und noch eine. Bis der letzte Schlag des Schiffsgongs das Ende der Schicht signalisiert. Jetzt eine Mütze Schlaf.

Mehrere Stunden lang schrubbt {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} das Deck, bis ein zahnloser alter Mann nach {mf|ihm|ihr} ruft. {mf|Er|Sie} bekommt eine Schale mit klarer Brühe und ein altes, schimmliges Stück Biomaterial — das Mittagessen. Dann scheucht die Sicherheit alle in die nächste Kammer, um dort weiterzuputzen. Und dann in die nächste. Und die nächste. Bis der letzte Schlag des Schiffsgongs das Ende der Wache signalisiert. Jetzt eine Mütze Schlaf.

languages.text: Vous récurez les ponts pendant plusieurs heures jusqu'à ce qu'un vieil homme édenté vous fasse signe. On vous tend un bol de bouillon clair et un morceau de biomatière moisie. C'est le déjeuner. Puis, la sécurité escorte tout le monde dans une pièce adjacente pour reprendre le nettoyage. Puis une autre. Puis encore une autre. Jusqu'à ce que le dernier coup de gong dans le vaisseau marque la fin du quart. Autant aller se reposer un peu.
languages.original_text: You scrub the decks for several hours until a toothless old man calls out to you. You are handed a bowl of clear broth and a stale, mouldy piece of biomaterial — lunch. Then security herds everyone into an adjacent chamber to resume cleaning. And then another one. And another one. Until the final strike of the ship's gong marks the end of the watch. Might as well get some sleep.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} récure les ponts pendant plusieurs heures jusqu'à ce qu'un vieil homme édenté lui fasse signe. On lui tend un bol de bouillon clair et un morceau de biomatière moisie. C'est le déjeuner. Puis, la sécurité escorte tout le monde dans une pièce adjacente pour reprendre le nettoyage. Puis une autre. Puis encore une autre. Jusqu'à ce que le dernier coup de gong dans le vaisseau marque la fin du quart. Autant aller se reposer un peu.

languages.text: Dişsiz, yaşlı bir adam sana sesleninceye dek saatlerce güverteleri temizliyorsun. Öğlen yemekte sana bir kâse temiz çorba ve bayat, küflenmiş bir biyomateryal parçası veriliyor. Ardından asayiş, herkesi bitişikteki bir odaya yönlendirip temizlik işine devam ettiriyor. Sonra bir başka odaya. Ardından bir diğerine. En sonunda geminin çanına vurularak vardiyanın bittiği işaret ediliyor. Uykuya ihtiyacın var.
languages.original_text: You scrub the decks for several hours until a toothless old man calls out to you. You are handed a bowl of clear broth and a stale, mouldy piece of biomaterial — lunch. Then security herds everyone into an adjacent chamber to resume cleaning. And then another one. And another one. Until the final strike of the ship's gong marks the end of the watch. Might as well get some sleep.
